attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is high time for an end to your sitting in that place, which you have dishonoured by your contempt of all virtue, and defiled by your practice of every vice. You have defiled that sacred place, and turned parliament into a den of thieves, by your immoral practices.  You have grown intolerably odious to the whole nation.  You were put in government to get grievances redressed and are yourselves dishonest!! 
In the name of God, Go!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
